studies.title: Studies
studies.name: Name
studies.empty: No studies have been created yet for your organisation.

studyactions.description: After the study has been validated you can link plugins and external apps to your study. The plugin or app must be used by the researcher who added it.
studyactions.shareback: Application shares data with participant group(s)

studyfields.no_change_warning: This setup cannot be changed anymore after Study has been validated.
studyfields.anonymous2: , reveals anonymized ID, year of birth, gender and country
studyfields.not_anonymous2: , requests member to share full name, birthday and contact Information (address, phone, email)
studyfields.assistance2: - the MIDATA member needs assistance of a health professional.
studyfields.groups_empty: No groups of participants have been defined yet.

studyparticipants.name: Name
studyparticipants.empty: This study does not have any participants matching your search criteria yet.

studyrecords.empty: Once data is available it can be downloaded here.

studyrules.title: Study Rules
studyrules.no_change_warning: This setup cannot be changed anymore after Study has been validated.
studyrules.terms_of_use_hint: If you require terms and conditions to be shown and accepted by the user. Please send the text to midata, we upload the text in correct style for you and provide you with the terms ID to be entered here.

addresearcher.success: A new researcher has been added to your organization.

addparticipant.success: A new participant has been added to your study.

studyteam.defineself: You may change your own rights by (re-)adding yourself to the team with different rights. You may only do so as long as you are the only team member and you cannot remove the manage team right from yourself.

study_checklist.name: Study name and description provided
study_checklist.name_help: Study name will be visible to participants. Description will be available on the portal and during app login
study_checklist.teamsetup_help: If more people than you are involved in carrying out the study provide all involved people and their roles. As long as you have not added more people you can change your own role by adding yourself again with another role.
study_checklist.groups_help: Your study may have one or multiple groups of participants. Please define the list of participant groups
study_checklist.sharingQuery_help: Your study has to explicitely state which data of the participants it will access. The data sharing query cannot be changed after study has been validated.
study_checklist.dates_help: Start and end date will be shown to the participants. Data freeze date determines date at which data is no longer updated.
study_checklist.terms_help: If you need terms and conditions to be confirmed online by participants please contact MIDATA.
study_checklist.validation_help: Validation will be done by MIDATA administration after it has been requested. Study may no longer be changed after validation has been requested
study_checklist.validation_passed_help: Please wait until study has been validated.
study_checklist.applications_help: You can link plugins and external apps to your study. These may read the participants data and/or share public data records back to the participants. The plugin or app must be used by the researcher who added it.
study_checklist.applinked: App has been linked with study
study_checklist.applinked_help: In order to link an app to your study please send the code of your study and the name of the app you want to have linked to MIDATA administration.
study_checklist.partsearchstart_help: As long as participant search is not started it is not possible to participate to the study. Apps which require study participation may not be used.
study_checklist.executionstart_help: Marks this study as officially started.
study_checklist.acceptedpart: Participants assigned to groups and accepted
study_checklist.acceptedpart_help: New participants must be assigned to a participant group and be accepted or rejected.
study_checklist.partsearchend_help: No new participants may be recruited after participant search has ended.
study_checklist.execend_help: When the study is ended data is immediately freezed. It will stay available for download.
study_checklist.exportdata_help: Export the study data as FHIR JSON bundle (separate for each participant group).
